elements.title: Li Zhaoxing (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Li Zhaoxing (pictured), a former Chinese minister of foreign affairs, has published more than 200 poems and was known as a "poet minister"?

elements.title: at least one person on every NFL All-Decade Team has played for the Green Bay Packers (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that at least one person on every NFL All-Decade Team has played for the Green Bay Packers, although one of those players was only with the Packers for one season?

elements.title: 2024 opening of regular sessions of the National Congress of Argentina (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the 2024 opening of regular sessions of the National Congress of Argentina took place at 21:00 instead of 12:00?

elements.title: Ground Round (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Ground Round attempted to diversify its meat-heavy menu with such dishes as swordfish and Mexican pizza?

elements.title: first great villain (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Final Fantasy's "first great villain" has been compared to characters like the Green Goblin and the Joker?

elements.title: Frank Croxton (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that singer Frank Croxton performed a duet with his father for the unveiling of a monument to a Confederate States Army general?

elements.title: Thomas Figures (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Thomas Figures prosecuted two members of the Ku Klux Klan for murder, and Michael Figures bankrupted their organization in a civil lawsuit?

elements.title: a 14,000-year-old puppy (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that ancient humans cared for a 14,000-year-old puppy?
